data.message: Scam alert on face book. If it sounds to be good to be true then it is a scam. Don't fall for it!! https://www.facebook.com/cathy.kathleen.779 Supposedly this is a federal grant. There is no such thing as free money. We have verify your information's and it shows that you are qualify to receive the grant, You are to choose the amount you wish to claim from us. And you will pay for the delivery fees... We will make every effort to ship your order within 24 hours You are to choose below amount you want to claim You pay $500 and get $30,000.00 You Pay $1,000 and get $50,000,00. You pay $2,000 and get $90,000,00. You pay $3,000 and get $150,000,00. You pay $5,000 and get $200,000.00 You pay $8,000 and get $300,000.00 You pay $10,000 and get $450,000.00 You pay $12,000and get $550,000.00 You pay $14,500 and get $750,000.00 You pay $16,000 and get $1,000,000.00 Finally you pay $19,000 and get $3,000,000.00
